languages.text: "Я... могу вас понять, Лорд-капитан. К сожалению, обычно откровенности я добиваюсь чем-то большим, чем цивилизованной беседой".

traits.locale_text: "Я... могу вас понять, Лорд-капитан. К сожалению, обычно откровенности я добиваюсь чем-то большим, чем цивилизованной беседой".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."
languages.original_text: "Я... могу вас понять, Лорд-капитан. К сожалению, обычно откровенности я добиваюсь чем-то большим, чем цивилизованной беседой".

traits.locale_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我……我明白你的意思，舰长大人。不过，一般情况下，我让别人对我坦诚相待的手段，恐怕与彬彬有礼的谈话截然不同。”
languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."

traits.locale_text: “我……我明白你的意思，舰长大人。不过，一般情况下，我让别人对我坦诚相待的手段，恐怕与彬彬有礼的谈话截然不同。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sé... lo que quiero decir, Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, mis métodos habituales para inducir el candor del que habla guardan poca relación con la conversación civilizada».
languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."

traits.locale_text: «Sé... lo que quiero decir, Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, mis métodos habituales para inducir el candor del que habla guardan poca relación con la conversación civilizada».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…言いたいことはわかる。しかし、率直さを引き出すための我のいつもの方法は、文明的な会話とは似ても似つかぬものだ」
languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…言いたいことはわかる。しかし、率直さを引き出すための我のいつもの方法は、文明的な会話とは似ても似つかぬものだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je... vois ce que vous voulez dire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cependant, les méthodes auxquelles j'ai habituellement recours pour susciter l'honnêteté n'ont rien à voir avec une conversation civilisée. »
languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Je... vois ce que vous voulez dire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cependant, les méthodes auxquelles j'ai habituellement recours pour susciter l'honnêteté n'ont rien à voir avec une conversation civilisée. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... weiß, was Ihr meint, Lord Captain. Aber meine üblichen Methoden, um für Offenheit zu sorgen, haben wenig gemein mit zivilisierten Unterhaltungen."
languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... weiß, was Ihr meint, Lord Captain. Aber meine üblichen Methoden, um für Offenheit zu sorgen, haben wenig gemein mit zivilisierten Unterhaltungen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."

languages.text: "Ben... Ne kastettiğini anlıyorum Lord Kaptan. Ancak samimiyeti sağlamada sıklıkla kullandığım yöntemler, medeni sohbetlerle pek benzerlik taşımaz."
languages.original_text: "I... know what you mean, Lord Captain. However, my usual methods for eliciting candour bear little resemblance to civilised conversation."
